sentences.translation: I need to inspect this case.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在我们购买房子之前，我们请专门的人来考察了沙土的质量。
sentences.traditionalText: 在我們購買房子之前，我們請專門的人來考察了沙土的質量。
sentences.pinyin: zài wǒmen gòumǎi fángzi zhīqián, wǒmen qǐng zhuānmén de rén lái kǎochá le shātǔ de zhìliàng.
sentences.translation: Before we bought the house, we had someone specially come and inspect the quality of the soil.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他们正在对汽车事故现场进行现场考察。
sentences.traditionalText: 他們正在對汽車事故現場進行現場考察。
sentences.pinyin: Tāmen zhèngzài duì qìchē shìgù xiànchǎng jìnxíng xiànchǎng kǎochá.
sentences.translation: They are on the spot investigating the car accident scene.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了更好的理解这次地震的影响，地震学家们正在对受影响地区进行现场考察。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了更好的理解這次地震的影響，地震學家們正在對受影響地區進行現場考察。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile gèng hǎo de lǐjiě zhè cì dìzhèn de yǐngxiǎng, dìzhèn xuéjiāmen zhèngzài duì shòu yǐngxiǎng dìqū jìnxíng xiànchǎng kǎochá.
sentences.translation: To better understand the impact of this earthquake, seismologists are conducting on-the-spot investigations in the affected areas.
